sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { pageTitle } from '../../helper'; import Cta from '../Cta'; import FunFact from '../FunFact'; import PageHeading from '../PageHeading'; import Div from '../Div'; import SectionHeading from '../SectionHeading'; import TeamSlider from '../Slider/TeamSlider'; import Spacing from '../Spacing'; export default function AboutPage() { pageTitle('About'); const funfaceData = [ { title: 'Global Happy Clients', factNumber: '1.5K', }, { title: 'Project Completed', factNumber: '2.5K', }, { title: 'Team Members', factNumber: '220', }, { title: 'Our products', factNumber: '3', }, ]; useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); return ( <> {/* Start Page Heading Section */} {/* End Page Heading Section */} {/* Start About Section */}

At DH Solutions, we stand as a registered PVT Limited Company, authorized by SECP, and our journey towards excellence doesn't stop there. We're actively progressing with the registration of our LLC, a testament to our global ambitions. With a dedicated team of over 220 IT experts, we're armed with the skills, expertise, and determination to provide unparalleled digital solutions that drive your success. Our commitment to innovation, coupled with our legal recognition and growing capabilities, ensures that we're poised to elevate your business to new heights.

{/* End About Section */} {/* Start Fun Fact Section */}
{/* End Fun Fact Section */} {/* Start Why Choose Section */}

Within our ranks, a collective wealth of experience resides. Our team comprises seasoned professionals, each with a storied background in their respective fields, ready to steer your projects towards triumph.

From industry pioneers to tech virtuosos, our ensemble of experts is dedicated to weaving excellence into every endeavor, ensuring your journey with us is guided by the wisdom of those who've mastered their craft.

{/* End Why Choose Section */} {/* Start Team Section */}
{/* End Team Section */} {/* Start CTA Section */}
{/* End CTA Section */} ); }
